title: Dispense Medication for an Inpatient
description: A pharmacy technician needs to fill a medication order for an inpatient.

tasks.description: Retrieve a verified medication order from the pharmacy queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician selects an order that has already been approved by a pharmacist.

tasks.description: Pick the correct medication and strength from the pharmacy shelves.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician physically retrieves the correct drug.

tasks.description: Prepare the dose, label it for the correct patient, and have it checked by a pharmacist before sending it to the nursing unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The medication is correctly prepared and labeled for administration.
